sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Update Defect Enhancement Testing/QA state from 4 to 8</description>
        <name>Update defect enhancement Testing State</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if(GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp')) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('rm_defect');
	gr.addQuery('state', 8);
	gr.query();
	if ( !gr.next() ) {
		new GlideMultipleUpdate('rm_defect').changeValue('state',4,8);
	}
	gr = new GlideRecord('rm_enhancement');
	gr.addQuery('state', 8);
	gr.query();
	if ( !gr.next() ) {
		new GlideMultipleUpdate('rm_enhancement').changeValue('state',4,8);
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-10-20 11:29:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>033bd6fa373321001a8326877e41f12b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update defect enhancement Testing State</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development" source="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp">4e159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_033bd6fa373321001a8326877e41f12b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-05-07 11:03:18</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
